description: Kendra was stealing the company's top secret elevator plans only to be caught red-handed by Torque! After some initial play, she escapes onto the roof. Torque tracks her down and ties her to the neighboring building's window. Later she is tied to a beam and electric shock treatment teaches her the errors of her ways. Finally, Kendra gets a look at the elevator by being suspended in it.
title: Kendra James and Torque
